intervalpsych

The goal of intervalpsych is to help you with the analysis of interval responses.

Installation

You can install the latest version of intervalpsych from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("matthiaskloft/intervalpsych")

Ressources

  • Website: https://matthiaskloft.github.io/intervalpsych/

  • Vignette: Interval Truth Model
